original: 每座據點都可任命一位太守，太守管理能力越高，對據點發展越有利。同時太守也負責應對敵方武將的計謀。
text: Each stronghold can appoint a prefect. The higher the prefect’s management ability, the more beneficial to the development of the stronghold. At the same time, the prefect is also responsible for dealing with the strategies of the enemy generals.
